Body: {"id":"chatcmpl-397","object":"chat.completion","created":1766960817,"model":"qwen3:latest","system_fingerprint":"fp_ollama","choices":[{"index":0,"message":{"role":"assistant","content":"","reasoning":"Okay, let's see.
